name: High Noon VR
description: There is a new sheriff in town! High Noon is a fun VR shooter where you play as a sheriff in a small town somewhere in the Wild West.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows™ (7 SP1, 8.1, 10) Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 / AMD FX™ 8350 or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce™ GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon™ RX 480 or better DirectX: Version 10 Additional Notes: HTC Vive, Oculus Rift (1x HDMI 1.4 port,  DisplayPort 1.2)
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
